July 16, 1863
Dr. Herold C. Hunt
Consultant to the Foundation
Ford Foundation
477 Madison Avenue
New York 22, New York
Dear Dr, Hunt:
Enclosed is an application to the Ford Foundation
for a grant to permit the National Association of
Educational Broadcasters to conduct a series of
national and regional workshops designed to improve
the competence of personnel engaged in Instructional
television. The proposed project would run for three
years.
We discussed this project with Ted Conant during
the time we were preparing the proposal, and he
suggested that we send it to you.
We will appreciate your consideration of this project,
and we will he happy to supply any more detailed
information you may want.
Sincerely,
Harold E. Hill
HKH/mlm
